title: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even if dataset is not set
description: When adding a table report item and not setting the dataset, the user should still be able to create a new table group. Currently, the group dialog is not being displayed if the dataset is not defined.
OB: Currently, when a table report item is added without setting the dataset, the user is unable to create a new table group as the group dialog does not appear.
EB: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even if dataset is not set. Add a table report item without setting the dataset and try to create a new table group. The group dialog should be displayed, allowing the user to define the group.
SR: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even if dataset is not set. To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 1. Add a table report item without setting the dataset. 2. Try to create a new table group. The group dialog should be displayed and allow the user to define the group.
